name: GetSocialApps
overview:
Building social applications is no more a difficult task but to make it a cost-effective, customer-oriented and revenue generating tool is what makes GetSocialApps different from other application service providers. GetSocialApps is a team of well qualified, extremely talented and experienced professionals who gives you a complete package of fresh and innovative ideas with excellent quality that you would have never experienced before.

GetSocialApps provides you a range of services which would include:

  • Facebook Application Development
  • Twitter Application Development
  • iPhone Application Development
  • Bebo Application Development
  • Open Social Apps Development
  • Myspace Application Development
  • Facebook Fan Page Creation
  • Innovative and unique design layouts for your application.
  • Listing of the application in facebook application directory.
  • Developing marketing strategies and plans.
  • Market the application to a number of users worldwide.
  • Tracking your application.

GetSocialApps is the answer to all your questions.
